verbose_text: Upon LIF stimulation, three intracellular pathways are mainly activated, comprising the Janus kinase (Jak)-signal transducer and activator of transcription (Stat) 3, mitogen activated protein kinase (MAPK) and phosphoinositide 3-kinase (PI3K)-Akt pathways.
evidence: Janus kinase (Jak)-signal transducer and activator of transcription (Stat)3, mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK
